author: wsjcom
title: A Look at Recent School Shootings in U.S.
text:
Authorities say a former student opened fire at a Florida high school Wednesday, killing 17 people. The Broward County sheriff said a 19-year-old suspect is in custody. Here is a look at some recent U.S. school shootings, and some of the deadliest of years past:
Jan. 23, 2018: Two students were killed and 14 wounded by gunfire when a student opened fire before classes began at Marshall County High School in west Kentucky, authorities said. A grand jury is meeting to consider charging the 15-year-old boy as an adult.
...
